      • distanceInMeters

        public static float distanceInMeters(double latitude1,
                     double longitude1,
                     double latitude2,
                     double longitude2)
        Calculates the distance between two positions
        Parameters:
        latitude1 - latitude of the first position
        longitude1 - longitude of the first position
        latitude2 - latitude of the second position
        longitude2 - longitude of the second position
        Returns:
        the distance in meters between the given positions

        Parameters:
        string - the string to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is null or empty, false otherwise

      • containsIgnoreCase

        public static boolean containsIgnoreCase(java.lang.String s1,
                         java.lang.String s2)
        Redefinition of the String "contains" method, non case-sensitive
        Parameters:
        s1 - the first string
        s2 - the second string
        Returns:
        true if the first string contains the second string (non case-sensitive), false otherwise

      • subString

        public static java.lang.String subString(java.lang.String string,
                         int end)
        Redefinition of the String "substring" method
        Parameters:
        string - the string that has to be cut
        end - the index of the end of the substring
        Returns:
        the initial string cut until the end index, or the initial string if the index is higher than the string's size

      • isNullOrEmptyNoNull

        public static boolean isNullOrEmptyNoNull(java.lang.String string)
        Ridefinition of the "isNullOrEmpty" method
        Parameters:
        string - the string that has to be check
        Returns:
        true if the string is null or empty or is composed by the text "null", false otherwise
